lines.i: A collection of qualitative assessments of the patient's physical condition

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.78"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11103)
This component contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Skin Assessment

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11105)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Head Assessment (CONF:11104)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11342)
This component contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Neurological Assessment

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11107)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Face Assessment (CONF:11106)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11109)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Neck Assessment (CONF:11108)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11111)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Chest And Lungs Assessment (CONF:11110)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11113)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Heart Assessment (CONF:11112)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11115)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Abdomen Assessment (CONF:11114)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11117)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Pelvic And Genitourinary Assessment (CONF:11116)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11119)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Back And Spine Assessment (CONF:11118)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11121)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Extremities Assessment (CONF:11120)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11123)
Such components MAY contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Eye Assessment (CONF:11122)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component} (CONF:11125)
This component MAY contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Mental Status Assessment (CONF:11124)
contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode with @xsi:type="x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer"
contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode with @xsi:type="ActMood"
contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode with @xsi:type="CS"
